title: Large-Scale Community-Based Learning (CBL) Program for Strengthening Preservice Mathematics Teachers' Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of educational theories
context.additional_context: Targeting learners requiring enhanced mathematical education competencies as working professionals; environment with digital device accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can design a process for solving real-world community problems using mathematical approaches.
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers and local stakeholders to concretize problem-solving solutions.
Learners can develop instructional strategies that integrate theoretical knowledge and field application skills through reflective practice.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
